title: Thomas Coriate traueller for the English vvits: greeting From the court of the Great Mogul, resident at the towne of Asmere, in easterne India.
author: Coryate, Thomas, ca. 1577-1617.
publisher: Printed by W. Iaggard, and Henry Fetherston,
notes: An eighteenth-century type facsimile has "Featherston" in the imprint.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
